name: mini-range-slider
description: MiniRangeSlider is a customizable range slider component for Alipay mini apps, allowing users to select a range of values by sliding between two handles. The component offers a variety of customization options, including setting the minimum and maximum values, button size, and colors for the slider track, selection area, and handles. With smooth sliding transitions and easy-to-use event handlers, MiniRangeSlider is the perfect solution for creating dynamic and interactive user interfaces in your Alipay mini apps.
author: Abraham Yonas
